full_summary:
====================

**Notice of E6TOR-13RM20G**
----------------------------

**Tender Reference Number:** WS3987012668-Doc4572419640
**Solicitation Reference Number:** WS3987012668
**Publication Date:** May 6, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 21, 2024, at 14:00 EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Criteria for Evaluation:** Lowest Price

**Overview of the Project**
-------------------------

This Request for Standing Offer is issued for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region). The services will be required on an as-needed basis, and the contractor will be responsible for providing a minimum of 1,000 temporary personnel services per year.

**Contract Term and Conditions**
---------------------------

The proposed contract term will be 12 months, with a start date of June 1, 2024, and an end date of May 31, 2025. The contract may be extended for an additional one-year period. The procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business.

**Key Details**
-------------

*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Geographical Areas:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   **Contract Type:** Standing Offer
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For any inquiries or correspondence, please contact:

*   **Berends, Robert (SPAC/PSPC)**
    *   **Email:** robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Publication Details**
---------------------

The notice package can be accessed through:

*   **https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19608991?extsite=MTk2MDg5OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==**
